Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\PC\\Desktop\\TheObserver" commit -m "Fix ticker endless loop with 4 copies

- Render 4 copies of headlines for seamless looping
- Change animation to -25% to match 4 copies

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Secure guest voting with RPC functions

- Replace upsert with delete+insert for reliable partial index handling
- Add guest_vote and guest_unvote RPC functions for secure guest operations
- Tighten RLS policies: guests can only modify via RPC, not direct table access
- Authenticated users retain direct table operations

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\PC\\Desktop\\TheObserver" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: SEO-friendly URL slugs for articles

Replace Telegram IDs in URLs \(e.g. /observer_5/447\) with descriptive
slugs \(e.g. /iran-nuclear-deal-analysis\). Old URLs auto-redirect.

- Add slug column to articles table with unique index per channel
- Backfill all 609 existing articles with generated slugs
- Public routes resolve by slug; admin routes keep telegram_id
- Update sitemap, OG images, bookmarks, live feed links
- Add slug generation to admin article creation and Telegram pipeline
- Fix pre-existing build error: move revisions API out of catch-all route

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
